ygData.subject: Re: Dual Weapon question
ygData.msgSnippet: If you are looking for non-magic, you should head to Crushbone and work on some Dwarven Axes, look the same as mino axes, damage 6 delay 28, less damage but
ygData.messageBody:
If you are looking for non-magic, you should head to Crushbone and work on some Dwarven Axes, look the same as mino axes, damage 6 delay 28, less damage but MUCH faster, more hits = more over all damage.

If you are looking for magic, you should head to Najena and work on some Tenticle Whips.

Salr D'Taynkk
Dark Warrior of The Kith
Veeshan

>>> CAB <Bash@...> 5.14.99 12:34:25 PM >>>
From: CAB <Bash@...>

16th level warrior full banded and a pair of Mino axes. Don't mind the
weight 133 str in current gear. Wondering what weapons I should be
looking to upgrade to. Keep hearing about combine weapons, but besides
being magical and 1 delay better than steel they don't seem that great.
What's the best 1HS weapon to get for dual for warriors?

Bashlor
